title: Snap Menu
description: Restaurants can upload their menus through a user portal and obtain a QR code for customers to view their new, digitial menus.

title: Projectify
description: A project and task manager, which uses web sockets to create real time changes and chat with group members.

title: Daily Dose
description: A content aggregator for news and media sources. Utilizes web scraping to gather articles and posts.
